title: Tom Brady's Top 5 Moments as a New England Patriot (Football 4/1)
description:
Tom Brady is not a New England Patriot. Tom Brady is a Tampa Bay Buccaneer. It still seems weird to say and weird to write. And no, it's not some sick April Fool's joke. While we have plenty of time to speculate about TB12 the Buc, we wanted to look back at his time as a Pat and provide a list of some of his greatest moments. Will Brinson is joined by two CBS Sports writers, Tyler Sullivan and Pete Blackburn, who grew up watching Brady. The guys list their Top 5 moments for Brady's tenure in New England and definitely leave room for debate.

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @PeteBlackburn, @TylerSully
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/

To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
